useCase.name: Access Embargo Metadata
useCase.trigger: Archivist requests embargo metadata for ETDs

mainSequence.step: Archivist requests embargo metadata for ETDs from Web Interface
Web Interface fetches embargo metadata from EDRMS Backend
EDRMS Backend queries embargo metadata from Repository Database
Repository Database returns metadata to EDRMS Backend
EDRMS Backend displays metadata to Web Interface
Web Interface shows embargo metadata to Archivist
